thread.title: SyncDog, Inc. to Demonstrate Secure Enterprise Mobility Workstation Suite at CTIA
thread.title_full: SyncDog, Inc. to Demonstrate Secure Enterprise Mobility Workstation Suite at CTIA - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SyncDog, Inc. to Demonstrate Secure Enterprise Mobility Workstation Suite at CTIA
text:
SyncDog's partnerships with Mobileyes Consulting Inc., Folr Business, and Artifex Software Inc. have created an enterprise mobile security suite that offers deep functionality with full-service consulting.
Reston, VA
SyncDog, Inc. , the leading ISV for mobile application containerization, announces it will demonstrate its leading secure mobile workstation suite, SentinelSecure, at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 in Las Vegas. Through its strategic partnerships with Mobileyes Consulting Inc., Folr Business, and Artifex Software Inc., SyncDog brings customers robust functionality for securing mobile data and mobile apps with government-grade encrypted security. SyncDog will feature its SentinelSecure mobility workstation suite from booth 6647 at CTIA, scheduled for Sept. 9, 10, and 11, at the Las Vegas Sands Expo.
Partners that help solidify the SentinelSecure mobility solution:
Canadian-based Mobileyes Consulting is SyncDog's newest partner and has been providing expert mobile solutions while creating and distributing digital content for more than 14 years. Mobileyes provides consultancy expertise in healthcare and government mobile security. To read more about SyncDog's partnership with Mobileyes, click here .
Folr Business provides a location-based system that keeps track of employees on the move, whether they are delivery personnel, police officers, sales teams, or something else entirely. Folr believes that employees are any company's greatest assets and their innovative software helps administrators and end users answer the simple question of where their most valuable asset is at any given moment. To read more about SyncDog's partnership with Folr, click here .
Artifex Software Inc. is one of SyncDog’s longest-running partners and provides Smart Office, a leading Mobile Document Productivity Suite. The Smart Office app enables end-users to view, edit, create, share and print MS Word, PowerPoint, Excel files, and also allows for PDF annotation and file conversion. For more information on Artifex's SmartOffice, please click here .
“We have a responsibility to our customers to only partner with the organizations we believe will further enhance customers’ enterprise mobile security,” said Jonas Gyllensvaan, SyncDog president and CEO. “Our strategic partnerships with Mobileyes, Folr, and Artifex round out our mobile security suite with functionality designed to create the most secure mobile workspace without compromising user experience.”
To learn more about SyncDog SentinelSecure’s mobile workstation product suite, click here . If you are attending CTIA Super Mobility 2015 and would like a live product demonstration, please stop by booth 6647 during exhibit hall hours. If you are unable to attend CTIA in Las Vegas but would like a product demonstration, please click here .
About SyncDog, Inc.
SyncDog is the leading independent software vendor (ISV) for containerized application security for enterprise mobile computing. SyncDog’s flagship product SentinelSecure provides defense-grade secure mobile device partitions or “containers” that can secure email & contacts, calendar items, IM apps, Internet browsers, mobile file stores and other business apps provisioned on personal devices to be used in a BYOD or COPE (corporate owned personally enabled) setting. SentinelSecure protects both data at rest and data in transit through Federal Information Processing Standard or FIPS 140-2 AES 256 bit encryption.
Utilizing the SentinelSecure container, IT administrators have the enterprise visibility to incorporate mobile device security into organizational strategies for enterprise security that includes the proper audit trails for compliance. For more information on SyncDog products please visit http://www.syncdog.com .
About CTIA Super Mobility 2015
CTIA Super Mobility 2015 is the largest forum in the Western Hemisphere for the mobile innovations that power our connected life. More than 35,000 mobile professionals and executives and 1,100+ exhibitors from around the globe gather for this powerhouse technology event for its unrivaled networking opportunities and to share leading-edge trends, discoveries and knowledge. CTIA Super Mobility 2015 will be held Sept. 9, 10 & 11, 2015, at the Sands Expo and Convention Center in Las Vegas, USA.
